sentences.en: As members of the Family of Light, the reincarnation experience of yourself includes nonhuman forms.
sentences.cn: 作为光家族成员, 你们自己的化身经验包括非人类形态.

sentences.en: But can we see pain in nonhuman faces?
sentences.cn: 但是我们能否在动物脸上发现痛苦的表情 呢 ?

sentences.en: Genetic control is an important component general management of nonhuman primate colonies.
sentences.cn: 遗传学控制在非人灵长类动物人工繁殖种群诸多管理环节具有至关重要的作用.

sentences.en: Genetic control is an important component of the general management of nonhuman primate colonies.
sentences.cn: 摘要遗传学控制在非人灵长类动物人工繁殖种群诸多管理环节具有至关重要的作用.

sentences.en: Hostility towards outsiders is characteristic of both human and nonhuman animals.
sentences.cn: 敌视外来者是人类和其他动物共有的特征。

sentences.en: Nonhuman primates phylogenetic closeness to human being and its ES lines are very similar to human.
sentences.cn: 非人灵长类作为与人类亲缘关系最密切的动物,其ES细胞与人类十分接近.

sentences.en: On one level, the immune system simply destroys anything it recognizes as nonhuman.
sentences.cn: 在一定程度上, 免疫系统将破坏一切被它识别为非人体的东西.

sentences.en: The algorithm of this system excludes other nonhuman objects to detect human.
sentences.cn: 该系统算法通过排除非人体目标实现人体检测.

trans.tran_en: Nonhuman means not human or not produced by humans
